objective:
Objective:

Learn how to enhance accessibility by providing meaningful text alternatives (alt text) for images and icons.
task:
Task:

You are provided with a decorative image (in its default state) that currently lacks a descriptive text alternative.

Modify the code to include an alt attribute, ensuring that screen readers vocalize the purpose of the image.
instruction:
Instruction:

In the file /webapp/exercises/Exercise08.fragment.xml add the alt and decorative properties in the Image control.
howToTest:
How to test:

  • Use NVDA (Screen Reader) to inspect the image. It should vocalize the descriptive text alternative.
helpCode:
<Image
  id="idExercise08Image"
  src="{images>/exercise08}"
  width="300px"
  //Take a look at alt property for sap.m.Image control
  //Take a look at decorative property for sap.m.Image control
/>
